info.name: TYVAAMFCDC restyled to make my eyes stop bleeding
info.description: TYVAAMFCDC restyled to make my eyes stop bleeding
info.additionalInfo:
It works only in Chrome for now. Will definitely do a Firefox one.

TYVAAMFC.com is the only Youtube music player worthy of the name, many thanks for it! 
But why oh, why did you have to make it so musch.... like itself?
